channel.title: Nightscape development project recruiting coders/
channel.description:
hello,my name is si force,as you know =\
and i decided to make a server called nightscape.
e-mail:killi05@hotmail.com
[u]i plan to have the following features:[/u]
1. full working special attacks 2. skill capes 3. god sword special attacks.. 4. barrows 5. own custom made mini-game. 6. custom pk zone 7. wood cutting area 8. mining area 9. monster training 10. members area 11. own custom client. 12. web client
i [u]will[/u] think of more features as we move on.
i am currently deciding the base,you may recommend a base.
the workers i need are the following:
[u]web designers[/u] [u]coders[/u] [u]forum admins[/u] [u]client makers[/u] [u]in-game moderator.[/u] [u]in-game admins.[/u]
i dont need a hoster because i'll be hosting my self
heres the current staff list:
owner: si force (me) co-owner: guardian co-owner: (free)
admins: - - - moderators: - - - -
web desginers: - - client makers: - - coders:(will get in-game admin) - - that's all the staff i need for now.
i will add pictures when i decide the base.
application: [code]name in-game: job wanted: experience in job: proof: other: (you can prove the proof bit out to me later..[/code]
once i get the source i will put the server up for coding purposes.

item.title: Nightscape development project recruiting coders/
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:

hello,my name is si force,as you know =\
